name: TeamSpeak 3 (Old Versions)
notes: The installer will display a terminal window to display the license, accept by pressing Q and Y then close the window.
content:
exe: ts3client_runscript.sh
files:
- installer: https://files.teamspeak-services.com/releases/client/3.2.3/TeamSpeak3-Client-linux_amd64-3.2.3.run
installer:
- chmodx: installer
- execute:
    args: --target $GAMEDIR
    file: installer
    terminal: true
